content.query:
/* creation format*/

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

/* creation external data source DEP ADLS*/
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE target_dep_adlsg2 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://fakedp@fakedatalakefordep.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO


/* data lake witoout mep*/
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'dump' AND type = 'U') DROP external TABLE dump;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dump
WITH 
(  	LOCATION = 'fakedp/targetdep.parquet' ,
    DATA_SOURCE = target_dep_adlsg2,  
    FILE_FORMAT = SynapseParquetFormat
) AS 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://fakedatalakesg.dfs.core.windows.net/fake/fake/test.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


/* data lake with MEP*/
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE target_dep_adlsg3 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://approval@datalakeapproval .dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)





IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'dump' AND type = 'U') DROP external TABLE dump;
    create  EXTERNAL TABLE dump
WITH 
(  	LOCATION = '/fake/target.parquet' ,
    DATA_SOURCE = target_dep_adlsg1,  
    FILE_FORMAT = SynapseParquetFormat
) AS 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://fakedatalakesg.dfs.core.windows.net/fake/fake/test.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]




select * from dump
